text: (atarku) avar, "en iraivane! Ivarkal ennai etan pakkam alaikkirarkalo, a(ttiya)tai vitac ciraikkutame enakku atika viruppamutaiyatakum; ivarkalin catiyai vittu ni ennaik kapparravillaiyanal, nan ivarkal pal cayntu (pavattal) arivillatavarkalil oruvanakivituven" enru (pirarttittavaraka) kurinar
